ygData.subject: Re: [Re: [eqbards] New message  ]
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi! Maximum EQ is what I was referring to: http://www.maximumeq.com/weapons.shtml Lots of good sites out there.  I like this because there is player commentary
ygData.messageBody:
Hi!

Maximum EQ is what I was referring to:

http://www.maximumeq.com/weapons.shtml

Lots of good sites out there. I like this because
there is player commentary on each weapon and average
price per item listed.

I also highly recommend:

http://www.attcanada.net/~reaper/index.html
(The Concert Hall)

http://www.eqlore.com/main_frame.html

(This is a guild site but there is a lot of good game
info here. And it's a shameless plug since I'm a
member and it's a multi server guild)

...if you're ever on Rodcet Nife, be sure to give me a
tell.

Tyunes
Bard of the 15th taunt



--- Lilyana Dearheart <Lilyanatwin@...>
wrote:
> Hi Tyunes,
>
> Thanks much for the feedback...it's greatly
> appreciated! Question (probably
> stupid), what is maximumeg? I tried it as a URL but
> no go and then I did a
> search for it and nothing.
>
> I have been looking for a site that has the going
> in-game prices for armor and
> weapons and this sounds like it may have that.....
>
> Thanks!
>
>
> Bill Costlow <atlatyl@...> wrote:
>
> > Hi Melodii,
> >
> > I would recommend finding something lighter that
> > doesn't bring down your stamina when
> fighting...look
> > for something under 5 lbs.
> >
> > A friend in my guild sold me a thulian claw (I'm
> still
> > paying on it...) that does just this. There are
> other
> > weapons that would do just as well. You might
> want to
> > check out the bard weapon section of maximumeg as
> the
> > comments and going price listed there will help
> you
> > target the weapon you want.
> >
> > Yours in Song
> >
> > Tyunes of Rodcet Nife
> >
> >
> > --- Lilyana Dearheart <Lilyanatwin@...>
> > wrote:
> > > Hello fellow Bards!
> > >
> > > I am new to the list and I would like to say
> that it
> > > is wonderful the
> > > information that is shared among the bards of
> EQ. I
> > > am a lvl 11 Bard on the
> > > Karana server and I need some information
> please.
> > >
> > > My bard is a half-elf and I currently have a
> full
> > > set of bronze armor and I'm
> > > equipped with a Turtle-shell Helm and I have a
> > > barbed leather whip and the
> > > screaming mace for weapons. I currently have the
> > > standard instruments, the
> > > drum for the spidersilk quest and a mandolin.
> > >
> > > My question is this....what kind of armor,
> weapons,
> > > and instruments would be
> > > worthy of investment for me at this point?
> > >
> > > My finances are slightly better, though not
> great,
> > > than a normal lvl 11 as my
> > > bard is my secondary character, albeit quickly
> > > becoming primary because I love
> > > being a bard!
> > >
> > > Any help and advice would be greatly
> > > appreciated....Thanks!!!
> > >
> > > V/R,
> > >
> > > Melodii (Bard of 11 seasons)
> > > Lilyana (Paladin of 17 seasons)
> > >
> > >
> >
